page.title: 14CHANGING EDGEWORTH.
page.content: The village has changed.It now has an {aging population}& few yougsters.Most people work in nearby towns.Most houses now have a{bathroom}and {eletricity}came to the village in the late 1940s.The{church}has one Sunday service now with about 18 people.No wedding or christening occurred between 1976 & this summer.There is little real village spirit now as there are few real village people, but there is still the{annual Guy Fawkes {bonfire and Christmas carol service. {Only 3 houses have been built since {1945.}The postoffice/shop closed 10 years ago.The buses are less regular &{the milkman calls only 3 times per {week.}Several houses are weekend houses for people from the Midlands. The village has{3 millionaires!.
